XXvisvantu:14: (Viśv .1) punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ
XXvisvantu:15: (Viśv .2) bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viśvapuryāṃ rājadhānyāṃ viśvāmitro nāma
XXvisvantu:16: rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskararogāpagataṃ
XXvisvantu:17: śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannaṃ. dhārmiko dharmarājā dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati. sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ
XXvisvantu:18: (Viśv .3) so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramati paricārayati.
XXvisvantu:19: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā (Viśv .4) sāṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā. dārako jāta abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirā
XXvisvantu:20: pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṃganāsaḥ sarvāṃgapratyaṃgopetaḥ (Viśv .5) tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate. kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti jñātaya ūcur yasmād ayaṃ dārako viśvāmitrasya rājñaḥ putras tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viśvantara iti nāmeti. tasya viśvantara iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ.
XXvisvantu:21: (Viśv .6) viśvantaro dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradattaḥ dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ
XXvisvantu:22: dvābhyāṃ krīḍanakadhātrībhyāṃ. sa aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair
XXvisvantu:23: upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhyate hradastham iva paṅkajaṃ
XXvisvantu:24: (Viśv .7) sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ. sa yāni tāni rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ
XXvisvantu:25: janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahe cchedye bhedye vedhye muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣaṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ (Viśv .8) viśvantaraḥ kumāro śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahati tyāge vartate tasya pradānavistaram upaśrutya yojanaśatād abhyarthijano 'bhyāgacchati. sarvaṃ ca paripūrṇamanorathaṃ preṣayati
XXvisvantu:27: maṇikanakarajatavajravidrumavaiḍūryamusāragalvārkendranīlavidyotitaṃ candanavarasārapariṇāmitaṃ siṃhavyāghradvīpicarmapariṇaddhaṃ pavanabalasamajavaiḥ kanakarajatamaṇighaṇṭikāpūrṇitaravaiś caturbhis turagair yuktaṃ syandanavaram adhiruhya nagarād udyānābhimukho niryayau.
XXvisvantu:28: (Viśv .10) atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprā vedavedāṃgavidas tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantarakumāram abhigamyocuḥ jayatu bhavāṃ kṣatriyakumāraḥ ity āha ca sarveṣu khalu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ sarvado bhavān /
XXvisvantu:29: ratham etad dvijātibhyo dānaṃ tvaṃ dātum arhasi //
XXvisvantu:30: (Viśv .11) ity evam ukte bodhisatvo laghulaghv eva tasmād rathavarād avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditahṛdayas tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ rathavaram
XXvisvantu:31: upadarśayann uvāca yathā mayā rathas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
XXvisvantu:32: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
XXvisvantu:33: (Viśv .12) so 'pareṇa samayena kundakumudahimarajatasitābhravarṇaṃ saptasujātasupratiṣṭhitacaraṇatalaṃ airāvaṇadviradavilāsagāminaṃ parasvābhāvyalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaṃ puṇyadarśanaṃ rājyavardhanaṃ nāma gajavaram adhiruhya parituṣṭabhṛtyamitrasevakānuyātrikaiś candra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu
XXvisvantu:35: (Viśv .13) atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprā vedavedāṃgavidas tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantarakumāram abhigamyocuḥ: jayatu bhavāṃ kṣatriyakumāra ity āha ca sadaityāmaralokeṣu viśrutaḥ sarvado bhavāṃ /
XXvisvantu:36: dātum enaṃ{d} gajavaram asmabhyas tvam ihārhasi //
XXvisvantu:37: (Viśv .14) evam ukte bodhisatvas tasmād api gajavarāl laghulaghv evāvatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditamanās tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ gajavaram upadarśayann uvāca
XXvisvantu:38: yathā mayā gajas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
XXvisvantu:39: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
XXvisvantu:40: (Viśv .15) śuśrāva ca rājā viśvāmitraḥ putreṇa cātra viśvantareṇa rājyavardhano nāma gajavaraḥ pratyarthikaprayuktebhyo viprebhyo dattaḥ
XXvisvantu:41: iti. śrutvā ca puna rājñā visvāmitreṇa paramakopakupitena viśvantaraḥ kumāra āhūyoktaḥ: gaccha kumāra na te madviṣaye vastavyam iti.
XXvisvantu:42: (Viśv .16) kumāraḥ pitrā parityaktaś cintayāmāsa: bodhāya mayā kṛtavyavasāyena sarvalokānugrahārthaṃ baddhasannāhena gajo 'sau tyaktas tadgṛhe vartamānena deyaṃ dānaṃ yathābalam /
XXvisvantu:43: tapovanaṃ vā saṃśṛtya kartavyo niyamaḥ paraḥ //
XXvisvantu:45: vaktuṃ na tūtsahe vākyaṃ na dāsyāmīti yācakaṃ //
XXvisvantu:46: (Viśv .17) athaivaṃ kṛtamatir bodhisatvo bhāryāyā mādryāḥ sakāśaṃ
XXvisvantu:47: abhigamyaitad vistareṇa nivedayāmāsa. tato mādrī sahaśravaṇād eva priyaviprayogāśaṃkitahṛdayā kṛtakarapuṭā bodhisatvam uvāca: āryaputra yady evam ahaṃ api tapovanaṃ yāsyāmi. na śakyaṃ mayā āryaputraviyuktayā muhūrtam api prāṇān dhārayituṃ. kutaḥ gaganam iva candravihīnaṃ sasyavihīnā bhaved yathā pṛthivī /
XXvisvantu:48: nalinīva jalavihīnā bhartṛvihīnā tathā bhaven nārī //
XXvisvantu:49: (Viśv .18) bodhisatva uvāca: avaśyam evāvayor ante viyogena bhavitavyaṃ.
XXvisvantu:50: eṣa hi lokasvabhāvaḥ. tvaṃ ca pravarānnapānaśayanāsanasaṃvasanopacitā
XXvisvantu:52: mūlapuṣpaphalāni cāhāro darbhopalakuśakaṇṭakacitāyāṃ mahyāṃ vicaritavyaṃ abhīkṣṇaṃ copavāsa upavasitavyaḥ, sarvajanasyātmā darśayitavyaḥ,
XXvisvantu:53: sarvaprayatnenātithayaḥ pūjayitavyās. tatrāpi ca mayā avaśyaṃ yathāśaktyā dānaṃ deyaṃ. tatra bhavatyā na kathaṃcid anutāpaḥ karaṇīyas tat punar api
XXvisvantu:55: mādrī kathayaty āryaputra yathāśaktyāham āryaputrasya anuvartiṣyāmīti.
XXvisvantu:56: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati yady evaṃ smartavyā te iyaṃ pratijñeti.
XXvisvantu:57: (Viśv .19) tato bodhisatvaḥ pitaram abhigamya mūrdhnā praṇipatyovāca
XXvisvantu:58: kṣamasva yat tāta mayāparāddhaṃ gajapradānaṃ prati pārthivendra /
XXvisvantu:59: eṣa prayāsyāmi purād araṇyaṃ kośakṣayo mā nṛpate tavābhūd // iti tataḥ putraviyogaviklavo rājā bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭha uvāca: putra tiṣṭha nivartyatāṃ dānān matir iti. bodhisatva uvāca apy eva parivarteta dharā sadharaṇīdharāḥ /
XXvisvantu:60: pradānān na tv ahaṃ cittaṃ nivarteyaṃ mahīpate //
XXvisvantu:63: paurajānapadaśatasahasrair anugamyamāno ratham adhiruhya tasmān nagaravarān nirjagāma.
XXvisvantu:64: (Viśv .21) atha kaścit puruṣas taṃ ruditaparidevitaśabdaṃ śrutvā
XXvisvantu:65: mahājanakāyaṃ ca nagaradvāreṇa nirgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvānyatamaṃ puruṣam uvāca:
XXvisvantu:66: bhoḥ puruṣa kiṃkṛto 'yaṃ mahājanakāyasya rudanaśabda iti. sa uvāca: kiṃ bhavān na jānīte. yad asmad-
XXvisvantu:67: deśāt svakān nṛpatinā svasutaḥ sudaṃṣṭro nirvāsyate sthiradhṛtir nirataḥ pradāne /
XXvisvantu:68: sa prasthito vanam apetya saputradāraḥ paurāḥ ca bhṛtya karuṇaṃkaruṇaṃ rudanti //
XXvisvantu:69: (Viśv .22) tato viśvantaro bodhisatvas tasmān nagaravarān nirgatān paurān yathānyāyam abhigamyovāca: nivartantu nivartantu bhavantaḥ. suciram api hi
XXvisvantu:72: priyaviprayogaḥ. kutaḥ sarveṣu lokeṣv avagamya jantoḥ priyair viyogo bhavatīti matvā /
XXvisvantu:73: kāryā bhavadbhir bhuvi sarvayatnaiḥ sthirāprakaṃpyā ca śamāya buddhiḥ //
XXvisvantu:74: (Viśv .23) atha triṃśadyojanātikrāntaṃ bodhisatvam avekṣyānyatamo brāhmaṇo 'bhigamyovāca: bhoḥ kṣatriyakumāra itas triṃśanmātrair yojanair adhiṣṭhānaṃ yato 'haṃ bhavato guṇaśravaṇād āgata iti. tad arhasi bhavān
XXvisvantu:75: anena rathavareṇa me saphalaṃ śramaṃ kartum iti.
XXvisvantu:76: tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca aho dvijasyāsya sudāruṇā matir vane 'pi yo 'bhyarthayate nṛpātmajaṃ /
XXvisvantu:77: na nāma kāruṇyam ihāsya jāyate narendraputre nṛpatiśriyā cyute //
XXvisvantu:78: bodhisatva uvāca: evaṃ na khalu na khalu bhavatyā brāhmaṇaḥ
XXvisvantu:79: paribhāṣaṇīyaḥ. kutaḥ yady ete na bhaveyur arthanadayo mādri pratigrāhakāḥ bodhiṃ kaḥ samavāpnuyād bhuvi naraḥ sarvapradānād ṛte /
XXvisvantu:80: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir uttamaguṇāḥ saṃbodhisatvāḥ sadā dānādyābhir avāpnuvanti niyataṃ sarvajñatām uttamām //
XXvisvantu:81: (Viśv .24) atha bodhisatvas tam apy aśvarathaṃ parameṇa praharṣeṇa tasmai brāhmaṇāya datvovāca annena mātsaryamalapravāhiṇā rathapradānena mamāstv iha dvija /
XXvisvantu:82: maharṣibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir anupravartito nirāsravo dharmamayo mahārathaḥ //
XXvisvantu:83: (Viśv .25) tato bodhisatvaḥ pramuditahṛdayas tam api rathavaraṃ brāhmaṇāya datvā kṛṣṇājināṃ kumārīṃ skandhe āropya mādrī ca jālinaṃ kumāraṃ tapovanābhimukhau saṃprasthitau. anupūrveṇa tapovanam anuprāptau. tato viśvantaro bodhisatvas tasmiṃ tapovane svahṛdayapraritoṣakaraṃ vratam āsthāya vijahāra.
XXvisvantu:84: (Viśv .26) tena khalu samayena anyatamasmiṃ karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ
XXvisvantu:85: prativasati sma. tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītaṃ. sa tayā sārdhaṃ
XXvisvantu:86: krīḍati ramati paricārayati. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāta aṣṭādaśabhir apalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ. sa yadā jujjavayati, tasya jujjuko jujjuka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā.
XXvisvantu:87: (Viśv .27) anyatamasmiṃ api karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati caturvedajñas.
XXvisvantu:88: tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītaṃ. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramati paricārayati. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā caturdināvadhinā mahatī saṃvṛttā. tena brāhmaṇena pratijñā kṛtā: na mayā kasyacid iyaṃ duhitā rūpeṇa vā kulena vā dhanena vā śilpena vā dātavyāpi tu yo mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigamiṣyati, tasya mayeyaṃ dātavyā.
XXvisvantu:89: (Viśv .28) atha jujjuko mantrārthī mantragaveṣī tasya gṛham upasaṃkrāntaḥ.
XXvisvantu:90: sa tena brāhmaṇenābhihito: bho māṇava kutas tvaṃ kiṃ vā prārthayasi sa kathayatīcchāmy aham upādhyāyasya pādaśuśruṣāṃ kartuṃ.
XXvisvantu:91: sa kathayati: śobhanam evaṃ kuruṣva māṇava. karaṇīyam etad brāhmaṇānāṃ.
XXvisvantu:92: (Viśv .29) sa tasyāntike vedādhyayanaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ. sa medhāvī jātīyaḥ. tena alpīyasā kālena catvāro vedā adhītāḥ
XXvisvantu:93: (Viśv .30) sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati: mayā pratijñā kṛtā na mayā kasyacid
XXvisvantu:94: iyaṃ duhitā rūpeṇa vā kulena vā dhanena vā śilpena vā dātavyā. api tu yo
XXvisvantu:95: mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigamiṣyati tasya mayeyaṃ dātavyā. anena ca māṇavakena mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigatā. ayaṃ ca aṣṭādaśabhir
XXvisvantu:96: apalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ. yady etāṃ dārikāṃ sa pratigṛhṇīyāc chobhanaṃ
XXvisvantu:98: (Viśv .31) tasya tenoktaṃ: māṇava mayā pratijñā kṛtā na mayā kasyacid iyaṃ duhitā rūpeṇa vā kulena vā dhanena vā śilpena vā dātavyā, api tu yo
XXvisvantu:99: mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigamiṣyati tasya mayedaṃ dātavyā. tvayā ca mamāntikāc caturo vedā adhigatāḥ. tavāhaṃ duhitā bhāryārtham
XXvisvantu:102: tasya tena mahatā śrīsamudayena vivāhaḥ kāritaḥ kṛtvā kathayati: māṇava patnīm ādāya svagṛhaṃ
XXvisvantu:103: (Viśv .32) sa tāṃ patnīm ādāya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ. sa tayā ucyate: āryaputra sukumārā nāhaṃ śaknomi karma kartuṃ. mama upasthāyakam anuprayaccheti.
XXvisvantu:104: sa kathayati: bhadre kuto mama upasthāyakaḥ.
XXvisvantu:105: sā kathayaty āryaputra viśvapuryāṃ viśvāmitro nāma rājā. tasya putro viśvantaro nāma. sa yat kiṃcit yācyate tat sarvaṃ dadāti. tasya sakāśān mama upasthāyakaṃ mṛgaya.
XXvisvantu:106: sa kathayati: bhadre yady evaṃ sahitaṃ gacchāvaḥ.
XXvisvantu:107: (Viśv .33) sa tayā sārdhaṃ viśvapuriṃ gatvā pṛcchati: kutra
XXvisvantu:110: (Viśv .34) atha jujjukaḥ patnyā sārdhaṃ tapovanaṃ gataḥ.
XXvisvantu:111: (Viśv .35) tato 'sau brāhmaṇo mādryā mūlaphalārtham abhigatāyās tapovanān nirgatya viśvantaram abhigamyovāca: jayatu bhavān kṣatriyakumāra iti
XXvisvantu:113: nūnaṃ tapovanagatau hi phalāmbubhakṣyau bālau sutau nayanatuṣṭikarau manojñau /
XXvisvantu:114: duḥkhānvitasya jagataḥ parimokṣaṇārthaṃ viśvantaras tyajati kaṃpati yena bhūmiḥ //
XXvisvantu:115: (Viśv .41) tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya
XXvisvantu:116: karuṇakaruṇaṃ rudantau viśvantarasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ:
XXvisvantu:117: prasīda tāta māvāṃ parityākṣīs tadānīṃ guruvihīnau gamiṣyāvaḥ aṃbā ca tāta niṣkrāntā tvaṃ ca no dātum arhasi /
XXvisvantu:118: yāvat tām api paśyāvas tato dāsyati nau bhavān //
XXvisvantu:119: tato bodhisatvaḥ sahaviklavahṛdaya .. .. .. .. .. vadanas tau bāladārakau
XXvisvantu:120: pariṣvajyovāca: putrakau na me hṛdayaṃ asnigdhaṃ nākṛpā nāpi nairghṛṇaṃ /
XXvisvantu:122: budhy evāhaṃ parāṃ bodhim abhigamya śivāṃ svayam /
XXvisvantu:124: (Viśv .42) tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya
XXvisvantu:125: karuṇadīnavilaṃbitākṣaraiḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ yady evaṃ vyavasāyas te vacanād āvayos tvayā vaktavyā jananī tāta kṣantum aṃba tvam ihārhasi //
XXvisvantu:126: api ca tāta yan nau guror apakṛtaṃ tvayi bālabāvād yady apriyaṃ kvacana kiṃcid udāhṛtaṃ vā
XXvisvantu:127: śuśrūṣayā ca paripūritam eva na syād bālāparādha iti tat khalu marṣaṇīyam //
XXvisvantu:128: ity uktvā pitaram abhivādya triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya guruvacanapālakau muhurmuhuḥ saṃparivartamānau nayanāmbupariplutākṣakau tasmād āśramapadād viniścakrāmatuḥ.
XXvisvantu:129: (Viśv .43) tato bodhisatvas tair atikaruṇair bāladārakavacobhiḥ viklavīkṛtahṛdayo bodhau manaḥ praṇidhāya tapova + + + + niṣkrāntamātrayoś ca punar tayor bāladārakayor ayaṃ trisahasramahāsahasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakaṃpito 'nekaiś ca devatāsahasrair hāhākāro 'ntarikṣāj jāto babhūva aho pradānasya māhātmyam aho satvasya niścayaḥ /
XXvisvantu:130: bālāv imau sutau tyaktvā yan na vikriyate manaḥ //
XXvisvantu:131: (Viśv .44) tasmiṃś ca samaye mādrī mūlaphalāny ādāyāśramapadābhimukhī
XXvisvantu:132: saṃprasthitā. tena ca mahatā bhūmikaṃpena tvaritatvaritam evāśramapadaṃ
XXvisvantu:133: saṃpratasthe. tatrānyatamā devatā siṃharūpadhāriṇī bhūtva mārgam avarudhyamānāvasthitā mā haiva madrī bodhisattvasya sarvasatvanirmokṣaṇakṛtodyogasya dānapāramitāyāṃ vighnam utpādayiṣyatīti.
XXvisvantu:134: tato mādrī tāṃ mṛgarājavadhūvilāsinīm uvāca mṛgarājavadhūvilāsini kim idaṃ mām uparudhya tiṣṭhasi dhruvam asmi yathā patiṃ gatā laghu mārgād apasarpa me tathā //
XXvisvantu:135: api ca tvam api mṛgarājapatnī aham api bhāryā narendrasiṃhasya /
XXvisvantu:136: dharmeṇa bhavasi bhaginī mṛgarājñi dadasva me mārgam //
XXvisvantu:137: ity evam uktā sā siṃharūpadhāriṇī devatā tasmān mārgād apakrāntā
XXvisvantu:138: (Viśv .45) tato mādrī 'nimittāny aprasannānīti matvā muhūrtaṃ cintayāmāsa:
XXvisvantu:139: yathāyam antarikṣe rudanaśabdaḥ śrūyate, yathā ca vanavāsināṃ bhūtānāṃ vidrāvaṇaśabdo vyaktam āśramapade akuśalaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha ca yathā sphurati me netraṃ yathā rauti vihaṃgamaḥ kathan nau bālakau tyaktau yathā ca matir utsukā //
XXvisvantu:140: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīkaṃpo vepate hṛdayaṃ ca me /
XXvisvantu:141: suvyaktau bālakau tyaktau yathā kāyaś ca sīdati //
XXvisvantu:142: (Viśv .46) saivam anarthaśatasahasrāṇi cintayantī āsramapadaṃ gatvā praviśya cāśramapadaṃ sasaṃbhrāntā nirīkṣate, na paśyati tau putrakau.
XXvisvantu:143: tato mādrī viklavahṛdayā vepamānā sthānapadānusāraṃ vikalpayaty asmin pradeśe jālimāṃ kumāraḥ saha bhaginyā mṛgapotakair abhīkṣṇaṃ krīḍitavāṃ.
XXvisvantu:144: imāni ca tābhyāṃ pāṃsunagarāṇi kṛtāni. imāni ca tayoḥ krīḍanakāni. tau tu na paśyāmi. atha vā aṃbā na dṛśyata iti parṇakuṭīṃ praviśya śayitau
XXvisvantu:146: (Viśv .47) ity evam āśaṃkāparigatahṛdayā sutadarśanalālasā mūlaphalāny ekānte upanikṣipya bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇā bhartuḥ pādayor nipatya pṛcchaty āryaputra kva gatau tau bāladārakāv iti. viśvantara uvāca āśayā samabhikrānto brāhmaṇo mama sannidhim /
XXvisvantu:147: tasya tau bālakau dattau tāv anujñātum arhasi //
XXvisvantu:148: (Viśv .48) athaivam uktā mādrī viṣadigdhaviddheva mṛgī bhūmau nipapāta.
XXvisvantu:149: jalāśrayoddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvartanaṃ parivartanaṃ karoti sma.
XXvisvantu:150: hṛtapoteva kurarī karuṇakaruṇaṃ virauti sma. pranaṣṭavatseva ca gaur
XXvisvantu:151: bahuvidhaṃ haṃbhāravair vilalāpa. āha ca bālapaṃkajasamānavaktrakau padmapatrasukumārahastakau
XXvisvantu:152: duḥkhitāv ananubhūtaduḥkhakau kāṃ gatiṃ mama gatau hi putrakau //
XXvisvantu:154: katham adya nu putrakau mama vrajato 'nyasya vaśena duḥkhitau //
XXvisvantu:156: na ca me 'dya sudṛṣṭakau kṛtau kṛpaṇair jīvati duḥkhitau bata //
XXvisvantu:158: kṣāntimārdavaiḥ sadā gurupriyau duḥkhitau hi paramaṃ sutau mama //
XXvisvantu:159: jñātimātṛparihīnakau ca tau bandhubhiś ca sahasā nirākṛtau /
XXvisvantu:160: durjanaṃ janam upetya pāpakaṃ duḥkhitau hi paramaṃ sutau mama //
XXvisvantu:161: kṣuttṛṣāparigṛhātmakau sadā kasya tau vaśam upāgamiṣyataḥ /
XXvisvantu:162: ārttiduḥkhaparipīḍitau ca tau preṣyabhāvam upayāsyato dhruvam //
XXvisvantu:163: karma nūnam iha pāpakaṃ mayā anyajanmani sudāruṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
XXvisvantu:164: prāṇinaḥ priyaśatair viyojitā yena gaur iva viraumy adharmikā //
XXvisvantu:165: yena satyavacanena me sadā sarvasatvasamatāṃ nataṃ manas /
XXvisvantu:166: tena satyavacanena me sutau dāsabhāvagamanād vimucyatām //
XXvisvantu:167: (Viśv .49) tato mādrī tābhyāṃ bāladārakābhyāṃ ye vṛkṣā ropitakāḥ pālitakāś ca tān kisalayasaṃchannāṇ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃbhramā pariṣvajyovāca
XXvisvantu:169: cetanā iva rudanti vṛkṣakā bālakāḥ stanavihīnakā iveti //
XXvisvantu:170: (Viśv .50) punaś ca tayor bāladārakayoḥ krīḍanakāny āśramavāsino
XXvisvantu:171: mṛgaśāvakān dṛṣṭvā karuṇādīnavilaṃbitair akṣaraiḥ vacanam uvāca duḥkham etad aparam hy analpakam yad ramanti mṛgaśāvakā ime /
XXvisvantu:173: (Viśv .51) tato mādrī yena mārgeṇa tau bāladārakau gatau taṃ mārgam
XXvisvantu:174: anusarantī tayor bāladārakayor itaś cāmutaś ca padāny ariktakāni dṛṣṭvā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā punar uvāca tāḍyamānau dhruvaṃ nītau yathā padavilaṃbitau /
XXvisvantu:175: kvacid gatau gatāvṛttau hā nṛśaṃsa dvijottama //
XXvisvantu:177: tau hi me hariṇapariplutākṣakau komalaiś caraṇakaiḥ kathaṃ gatāv iti
XXvisvantu:178: (Viśv .52) tato bodhisatvas tāṃs tathāparidevanātmikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tābhis
XXvisvantu:179: tābhiḥ śrutibhir anityatāpratisaṃyuktābhiḥ bahuprakāram anusaṃjñāpayann uvāca na darpān na ca vidveṣān mayā tyaktaṃ sutadvayam /
XXvisvantu:180: sarvasatvahitārthaṃ tu tyaktau tau dustyajau sutau //
XXvisvantu:183: tyāgādhiṣṭhānān mādri putrau yadā te tyaktau dustyājau lokanirmokṣaṇārtham /
XXvisvantu:184: dadyāṃ svāṃ dārāṃ vāhanaṃ cāpi vittaṃ sarvaṃ sarvebhyo dātum eṣā matir me // ity
XXvisvantu:185: (Viśv .53) atha mādrī dhairyam ālaṃbya cittena bodhisatvam uvāca na karomy antarāyaṃ te mā te bhūn matir anyathā /
XXvisvantu:186: mām apīcchasi ced dātuṃ nirviśaṃkaḥ prayaccha mām //
XXvisvantu:187: api ca yasyārthe svajanān vīra tyajasi snehaviklavāṃ /
XXvisvantu:188: tam arthaṃ prāpnuhi kṣipraṃ tāraya tribhavāj jagat //
XXvisvantu:189: (Viśv .54) tataḥ śakro devendras tad atyadbhutam atiduṣkaraṃ mādryā bodhisatvasya ca vyavasāyam avagamya tridaśagaṇaparivṛta upari vihāyasā tadāśramam upagamyodāreṇāvabhāsena tad vanam avabhāsya gaganatalastha eva bodhisatvam uvāca
XXvisvantu:190: yathā mūḍhe loke kumatimatiparyākulamatau vibho bhogāsakte sutahṛdayapāśāni sahite /
XXvisvantu:191: tvam eko niḥsaṃgas tyajasi tanayāṃ snehajanakāṃ dhruvaṃ kṣemaṃ śāntaṃ vimalam arajaṃ prāpsyasi padam //
XXvisvantu:192: (Viśv .55) tad evaṃ protsāhya bodhisatvaṃ śakro devendraś cintayāmāsa: eko
XXvisvantu:193: 'yam upasthāyakarahitaḥ khedam āpatsyate. yanv aham apy asmāt prāthayeyam iti. tato bodhisatvasakāśād apakramya brāhmaṇaveṣam āsthāya punar
XXvisvantu:194: bodhisatvam uvāca imāṃ sarvānavadyāṃgīm anuraktāṃ pativratām /
XXvisvantu:196: (Viśv .56) tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca nirlajjaś cāsi lubdhaś ca tvam iha brāhmaṇādhama /
XXvisvantu:197: saddharmaniratāṃ yas tvaṃ mām icchasi pativratām //
XXvisvantu:198: (Viśv .57) tato bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāparigatahṛdayo mādrīṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ. atha mādrī bodhisatvam uvāca na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ nāpekṣā me tathātmani /
XXvisvantu:199: yathā tvām anuśocāmi katham eko bhaviṣyasi //
XXvisvantu:200: tato bodhisatvo mādrīm uvāca aham iha bhuvi mādri nānuśocyaḥ parimṛgayaṃ padam akṣayaṃ viśokam
XXvisvantu:201: tam imam anusara dvijaṃ viśokā mṛgaśaraṇaṃ tv aham āśrame 'bhyupaimi
XXvisvantu:202: (Viśv .58) iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditamanāś cintayāmāsa idam asmiṃ vane dānaṃ paścimaṃ me bhaviṣyati mādrīpriyāṃ parityajya bhaviṣyāmy aparigrahaḥ //
XXvisvantu:203: iti viditvā mādrīṃ ca pāṇinā gṛhītvā taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca bhāvānuraktaśuśrūṣāṃ sadvṛttāṃ priyavādinīm
XXvisvantu:204: mama bhāryām imāṃ śiṣyāṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dvijottama //
XXvisvantu:207: (Viśv .60) tato mādrī bāṣpoparudhyamānā gadgadakaṇṭhī brāhmaṇavaśam āgatā
XXvisvantu:208: patiputraduhitṛvirahitā idam abhravīt kīdṛṅ mayā kṛtaṃ karma anāryaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
XXvisvantu:209: naṣṭavatseva gaur yena viraumi vijane vane //
XXvisvantu:210: (Viśv .61) tataḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa
XXvisvantu:211: sthitvā mādrīm uvāca na brāhmaṇo 'smi subhage na ca mānuṣo 'smi
XXvisvantu:212: śakras tv ahaṃ hy asuranāśakaraḥ surendraḥ /
XXvisvantu:214: tad brūhi kiṃ varam apīcchasi matsakāśāt //
XXvisvantu:215: tato mādrī tadvacanajanitasaumanasyā śakraṃ praṇipatyovāca mama putrau sahasrākṣa dāsabhāvād vimocaya /
XXvisvantu:217: (Viśv .62) tathety uktvā mahendraḥ punar āśramaṃ praviśya
XXvisvantu:218: bodhisatvasakāśam abhijagmivān. mādrīṃ ca vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā bodhisatvam uvāca ahaṃ mādrīm imāṃ tubhyaṃ dadāmi paricārikām /
XXvisvantu:219: na ca te kasyacid deyā nyāsadroho hi garhitaḥ //
XXvisvantu:220: (Viśv .63) tataḥ śakro devendras taṃ bāladārakaparigṛhītāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
XXvisvantu:221: tathā vyāmohayāmāsa yathānyanagaraśaṃkayā tad eva nagaram upagamya tau bāladārakau vikrītum ārabdho yāvad amātyair dṛṣṭvā rājño niveditaṃ etau putrasya te putrau brāhmaṇo 'smin purottame /
XXvisvantu:222: jālinaṃ ceva kṛṣṇāṃ ca vikrīṇīte ti dāruṇaḥ //
XXvisvantu:223: (Viśv .64) etac chrutvodbhrāntacittaḥ sa rājā prāha kṣipraṃ darśayadhvaṃ kumārau /
XXvisvantu:224: nāryaś cakruḥ krośam antaḥpurasthāḥ paurā rājñaḥ kṣipram eyuḥ samīpam
XXvisvantu:225: yāvad anyatamenāmātyena rājñaḥ sakāśam upanītau putrau nirīkṣya sa nṛpo 'bhimukhopanītau
XXvisvantu:227: siṃhāsanāt kṣititale sahasā papātaḥ paurā vicukruśur amātyagaṇāḥ striyaś ca //
XXvisvantu:228: (Viśv .65) tato rājā amātyān āmantrayate vane 'pi vasato dāneṣv abhirataṃ manaḥ /
XXvisvantu:229: tam ihānayata kṣipraṃ patnyā sārdhaṃ sulocanam //
XXvisvantu:230: (Viśv .66) tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvam abhinamasyamānaḥ svabhavanam
XXvisvantu:232: (Viśv .67) śakreṇa ca rājani viśvāmitre abhyatīte brāhmaṇāmātyapaurajānapadaiḥ sārdhaṃ tad āśramapadaṃ gatvā bodhisatvaṃ
XXvisvantu:234: (Viśv .68) tato viśvantaro rājā sarvaṃdado babhūva. sa śraṃanabrāhmaṇavanīpakasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavānujīvijaneṣu
XXvisvantu:235: dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate bodhiṃ prārthayamānena dānaṃ deyaṃ viśāradaḥ /
XXvisvantu:240: prāpnuvanti narāḥ śuddhim asmiṃ loke paratra ceti //
XXvisvantu:241: (Viśv .69) yadā viśvāmitreṇa rājñā viśvantaranimittaṃ jujjukāya brāhmaṇāya
XXvisvantu:242: prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattaṃ tadāsau vistīrṇavibhavo jātaḥ. tasya suhṛtsambandhibāndhavā mitrāṇi cāgamya kathayanti: yā kācit tava
XXvisvantu:243: śrīsaubhāgyasaṃpat sarvāsau viśvantarakumāram āgamyeti. sa kathayati: kiṃ mama viśvantareṇa kṛtam uttamavarṇaprasūto 'haṃ, dakṣiṇīyo lokasya; yena mama bhogā upanayanti.
XXvisvantu:244: (Viśv .70) bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau viśvantaro nāma rājakumāra aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena. yo 'sau jujjuko brāhmaṇa eṣa evāsau devadattas tena kālena tena samayena. tadāpy eṣa akṛtajñaḥ
XXvisvantu:245: akṛtavedī. etarhy apy eṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī. tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtavedinaḥ svalpam api kṛtaṃ na
XXvisvantu:246: nāśayiṣyāmaḥ, prāg eva prabhūtaṃ. ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
